oai_dc:dc.dc:title: ADAR: Soil
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Soil
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This part of the program (1 project) is about of the construction of tools for strategic decision-making aid on the soil tillage in organic farming, taking into account adventitious control and integrating the various functions of the soil.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: { Programme part} ADAR: Soil. Runs 2005 - 2007. Programme Leader(s): Gautronneau, Yvan.
